name: pwd_nn
description: Run password guessing neural network in browser

scripts.build-browser: mkdir -p build && browserify src/worker.js -p [minifyify --no-map] -o build/worker.min.js && browserify src/nn-client.js -p [minifyify --no-map] -o build/nn-client.min.js
scripts.build-browser-debug: mkdir -p build && browserify src/nn-client.js -o build/nn-client.js && browserify src/worker.js -o build/worker.js
scripts.test: npm run build-browser-debug && cp build/*.js examples/ && cp tests/* examples/ && node examples/server.js
